item.title: 钻石能源公司将以 40.8 亿美元的交易扩大在二叠纪的业务
item.description: 石油和天然气公司 Diamondback Energy 周二表示，它将以现金加股票的方式收购总部位于得克萨斯州的能源生产商 Double Eagle 的某些部门，交易价格约为 40.8 亿美元。【原文：Oil and gas company Diamondback Energy said on Tuesday it would buy certain units of Texas-based energy producer Double Eagle in a cash-and-stock deal for about $4.08 billion.】

item.title: 早间新闻华盛顿与莫斯科会晤，欧洲防务升级
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: J&J公司就100亿美元婴儿爽身粉和解方案展开关键之战
item.description: 强生公司本周二将面临一项严峻考验，该公司提出了一项价值 100 亿美元的提案，以结束指控其婴儿爽身粉导致卵巢癌的诉讼，因为该公司试图说服法官同意其第三次尝试通过子公司破产来解决数千起诉讼。【原文：Johnson & Johnson faces a critical test on Tuesday over its $10 billion proposal to end litigation alleging that its baby powder caused ovarian cancer, as it tries to convince a judge to sign off on its third attempt to resolve thousands of lawsuits through a subsidiary's bankruptcy.】

item.title: 期货在假期稀少的一周中稳步上扬；关注美联储的降息计划
item.description: 在上一交易日国债收益率下降之后，投资者希望深入了解美联储的政策计划，并为关税方面的任何声明做好准备，因此美国股指期货周二上涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday as investors sought insight into the Federal Reserve's policy plans following a decline in Treasury yields in the last session and braced for any announcements on the tariffs front.】

item.title: 行业机构称台湾电子企业计划增加对德州的投资
item.description: 一家行业机构的负责人周二表示，台湾电子企业正计划在美国得克萨斯州进行更多投资，并有可能在五月份宣布，以配合唐纳德-特朗普总统上任的头一百天。【原文：Taiwanese electronics companies are planning more investments in the U.S. state of Texas, with announcements possible in May to coincide with President Donald Trump's first 100 days in office, the head of an industry body said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，中国寻求在世贸组织就贸易动荡展开辩论
item.description: 中国呼吁世界贸易组织就 "贸易动荡 "以及全球贸易监督机构应如何应对展开辩论，这显然是指美国发起或威胁发起的关税。【原文：China has called for a debate at the World Trade Organization on "trade turbulence" and how the global trade watchdog should respond in an apparent reference to tariffs launched or threatened by the United States.】

item.title: 中国百度第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: 搜索引擎巨头百度周二公布的季度营收超过预期，表明中国广告市场有所复苏。【原文：Search engine giant Baidu , beat quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday, indicating some recovery in the Chinese advertising market.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金首席执行官一职吸引了 82 位应聘者，其中包括现任首席执行官
item.description: 挪威中央银行周二表示，已收到82份申请，要求担任该国庞大的主权财富基金首席执行官一职。【原文：Norway's central bank said on Tuesday it had received 82 applications for the position of CEO of the country's vast sovereign wealth fund.】

item.title: 独家报道欧盟反垄断负责人称特朗普颠覆了欧美关系
item.description: 欧盟竞争事务主管表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普颠覆了美国与欧洲之间的 "信任关系"，布鲁塞尔应专注于提供华盛顿所缺乏的可预测性和稳定性。【原文：The EU's competition chief says U.S. President Donald Trump has upended the "trustful relationship" between the United States and Europe, and that Brussels should focus on providing the predictability and stability that is lacking in Washington.】

item.title: 习近平的新一线企业卫士展示了他的工作重点和控制力
item.description: 2018 年，习近平主席在北京举行了一次罕见的会议，宴请企业家，获得令人垂涎的前排座位的高管们来自从高科技到能源的各个行业，其中鲜有耳熟能详的名字。【原文：When President Xi Jinping hosted entrepreneurs at a rare meeting in Beijing in 2018, the executives granted coveted front-row seats came from industries ranging from high-tech to energy, and few were familiar names.】

item.title: KKR 将增购埃尼生物燃料业务 5%的股份
item.description: 美国基金 KKR 周二表示，已与意大利埃尼公司签署协议，以 5.875 亿欧元（6.1417 亿美元）的价格收购埃尼公司生物燃料业务 Enilive 公司 5%的额外股份，使其总股份达到 30%。【原文：U.S. fund KKR has signed an agreement with Italy's Eni to buy an additional 5% stake in Eni's biofuel business Enilive for 587.5 million euros ($614.17 million), bringing its total stake to 30%, the energy group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 我们回来了"，希腊造船厂在经历数十年的痛苦后表示
item.description: 上个月，雅典附近的斯卡拉曼加斯造船厂传来了锤击声和焊接声，工人们正在修理一艘大型油轮的船头，而其他船只则在附近的干船坞等待修理。【原文：The sound of hammer blows and welding drifted from the Skaramangas Shipyard near Athens last month as workers repaired the bow of a large tanker, while other vessels waited to be fixed in a dry dock nearby.】

item.title: 老虎证券采用 DeepSeek 模式，中国券商和基金急于拥抱人工智能
item.description: 老虎经纪公司（Tiger Brokers）周二表示，它已将 DeepSeek 的模型嵌入到其人工智能聊天机器人中，因为经纪公司和资金管理公司正竞相利用这家中国初创公司在人工智能方面的突破，并为金融业开发用例。【原文：Tiger Brokers said on Tuesday it embedded DeepSeek's model into its AI-powered chatbot, as brokerages and money managers race to capitalise on the Chinese start-up's artificial intelligence breakthrough, and develop use cases for the financial industry.】

item.title: 特斯拉在马斯克与莫迪会晤后加大印度招聘力度，快速推进市场进入计划
item.description: 本周发布的招聘广告显示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司正在印度招聘高级员工，这标志着这家电动汽车制造商进军世界第三大汽车市场的计划取得了进展。【原文：Elon Musk's Tesla is looking to hire senior staff in India, job advertisements posted this week showed, signalling progress in the electric vehicle maker's plans to enter the world's third-biggest auto market.】

item.title: 凯捷 2024 年销售额略高于预期
item.description: 法国 IT 咨询集团凯捷（Capgemini）周二发布报告称，按固定汇率计算，其全年销售额下降了 2%，略高于市场预期。【原文：French IT consulting group Capgemini on Tuesday reported a 2% decline in its full-year sales in constant currency terms, slightly ahead of market expectations.】

item.title: 越南为马斯克的 "星链 "铺平道路，被视为美国关税威胁下的 "橄榄枝
item.description: 越南计划通过一项规定，允许埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）在该国提供卫星互联网服务，同时保持对任何当地子公司的完全所有权。【原文：Vietnam plans to adopt rules that would allow Elon Musk's Starlink to provide satellite internet services in the country while maintaining full ownership of any local subsidiary, a draft of the regulations shows.】

item.title: 英国机场协调公司击败澳航与维珍航空公司的合资公司，获得悉尼的航班时刻管理权
item.description: 澳大利亚交通部长周二表示，英国机场协调有限公司（ACL）赢得了政府主导的悉尼机场起降时段管理招标，取代了澳洲航空公司和维珍澳大利亚公司的合资企业。【原文：Britain's Airport Coordination Limited (ACL) won a government-led tender to manage takeoff and landing slots at Sydney Airport, Australia's transport minister said on Tuesday, replacing a joint venture between Qantas and Virgin Australia.】

item.title: 早间竞价乌克兰和谈前军火库存飙升
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：OpenAI 正在权衡特殊投票权，以防范恶意收购
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，OpenAI 正在考虑向其非营利性董事会授予特殊投票权，以维护其董事的权力，因为这家 ChatGPT 制造商正在抵御埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）主动提出的收购要约。【原文：OpenAI is considering granting special voting rights to its non-profit board to preserve the power of its directors, as the ChatGPT-maker fends off an unsolicited takeover bid from Elon Musk, Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国三一重工计划在香港上市，目标是融资至多 15 亿美元
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士周二表示，中国制造商三一重工正计划在香港上市，最多可融资 15 亿美元。【原文：Chinese manufacturer Sany Heavy Industry is planning a listing in Hong Kong that could raise up to $1.5 billion, two people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在上海工厂开始量产改款 Model Y
item.description: 美国汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）周二表示，该公司已开始在其上海工厂批量生产改良版的 Model Y。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla said on Tuesday it has started mass production of the revamped version of its Model Y in its Shanghai factory.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 "四大 "银行跟随央行下调利率
item.description: 澳大利亚 "四大 "贷款机构周二将利率下调了 25 个基点，这也是澳大利亚央行自 2020 年 11 月以来首次下调利率。【原文：Australian "Big Four" lenders cut their interest rates by 25 basis points on Tuesday, in tandem with the central bank cutting its rates for the first time since November 2020.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行降息，对进一步宽松持谨慎态度
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二自 2020 年疫情爆发以来首次降息，称虽然对进一步放宽政策的前景仍持谨慎态度，但在应对通胀方面已取得进展。【原文：Australia's central bank cut interest rates on Tuesday for the first time since the depths of the 2020 pandemic, saying progress had been made on inflation though it was still cautious about prospects of further policy easing.】

item.title: 智能电动车上市后，针对比亚迪的投诉充斥中国消费者门户网站
item.description: 中国一家知名汽车质量平台上充斥着对比亚迪（BYD）的投诉，原因是比亚迪为其大部分产品提供免费的智能驾驶功能。【原文：Complaints about BYD , over its move to offer free smart driving features across most of its line-up have flooded a prominent Chinese auto quality platform, many from customers who said they had overpaid for their cars.】

item.title: 消息人士称，汇丰在重组前裁减香港 40 名交易员
item.description: 据一位直接了解此事的消息人士称，作为该行全球重组的一部分，汇丰银行已在香港裁员约 40 名投资银行家。【原文：HSBC , has laid off around 40 investment bankers in Hong Kong as part of the bank's global restructuring, according to one source with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特拉华州法案将限制投资者诉讼，因为公司威胁离开该州
item.description: 特拉华州的立法者周一提议修改该州广泛使用的公司法，以限制股东诉讼，此前几家备受瞩目的公司表示可能会将其合法住所迁往另一个州。【原文：Delaware lawmakers on Monday proposed changes to the U.S. state's widely used corporate law that would limit shareholder lawsuits after several high-profile companies said they might move their legal home to another state.】

item.title: Dexus 将澳大利亚视为避风港，计划出售 20 亿澳元资产
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的写字楼业主德克萨斯公司（Dexus）周二表示，在地缘政治不确定的情况下，澳大利亚是投资者的安全港湾，该公司的目标是在三年内出售 20 亿澳元的资产，以应对商业地产市场的不景气。【原文：Dexus , Australia's largest office landlord, on Tuesday pitched the country as a safe harbour for investors amid geopolitical uncertainty, as it aims to sell A$2 billion of assets in three years in a faltering commercial property market.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）运输主管称解雇了不到 400 名员工
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）的员工总数为 45,000 人，其中解雇的员工不到 400 人，运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周一表示，由于近期接连发生飞机事故，人们对空中交通安全的质疑日益增多。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration fired fewer than 400 employees out of its workforce of 45,000, Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said on Monday, as questions rise around air traffic safety amid a spate of recent plane accidents.】

item.title: 三星电子提名芯片高管为新董事会成员
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周二提名其芯片业务主管 Jun Young-hyun 和首席技术官 Song Jai-hyuk 加入董事会，这家科技巨头正寻求提高其陷入困境的半导体业务的竞争力。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Tuesday nominated its chip business chief Jun Young-hyun and Chief Technology Officer Song Jai-hyuk to join its board, as the tech giant looks to boost competitiveness in its struggling semiconductor business.】

item.title: 布伦特油价因里海泵站袭击事件上涨后回落
item.description: 布伦特原油价格周二早盘暂停上涨，此前一个交易日，俄罗斯的一个石油管道泵站遭到无人机袭击，导致来自哈萨克斯坦的石油流量减少。【原文：Brent crude oil prices paused in early trading on Tuesday after gaining in the previous session following a drone attack on an oil pipeline pumping station in Russia that reduced flows from Kazakhstan.】
